----------------------------------------------------------------------
PAL Benchmark
----------------------------------------------------------------------

License

This is a collection of test and benchmarking programs for evaluating a physics engines performance.

Unlike the PAL library itself, the source code is distributed under the GPL. PAL is distributed under the BSD license.

The source code is provided to enable community feedback on the tests.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Building on Mac OS X

The Xcode 3.2 project file can be run from here: MacOSX/PALBenchmark.xcodeproj

PAL itself must be build before you can build and run the PAL Benchmark

----------------------------------------------------------------------
